Clothing.df <- read.csv("Clothing.csv", header=T)
attach(Clothing.df)
multreg.conditionplots <- function(df, predictornames, responsename){
  finalDf <- data.frame("a"=df[[predictornames[1]]])
  names(finalDf)[1] <- predictornames[1]
  for (index in seq_along(predictornames)) {
    if (index > 1) {
      finalDf$"a" <- df[[predictornames[index]]]
      names(finalDf)[index] <- predictornames[index]
    }
  }
  linreg2 <- lm(df[[responsename]] ~ ., data=finalDf)
  hist(linreg2$residuals)
}
multreg.conditionplots(Clothing.df, c("Amount"), "Recency")
linreg <- lm(Recency~Amount)
hist(linreg$residuals)
